string-array.name: local_cat_facts
string-array.item: Local: Cats have 230 bones, while humans only have 206.
Local: Cats have whiskers on the backs of their front legs, as well.
Local: Some cats are ambidextrous, but 40 percent are either left- or right-pawed.
Local: Cats live longer when they stay indoors.
Local: Cats can spend up to a third of their waking hours grooming.
Local: Cats will refuse an unpalatable food to the point of starvation.
